Reviews.Content: Although the tv came with a few bad pixels, it is a great product. Picture quality is amazing, tv is light, installation is quick, price was very reasonable. Could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Panama Red
Reviews.Content: my daughter loves it. Very good picture and decent sound. I would recommend it to my friends. Very thin tv

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Patrice Kelly
Reviews.Content: I am loving my new TV . It was shipped very quickly to me and was easy to assemble , in minutes it was up and working . Great color and picture for the price .

Reviews.Title: sound going  out
Reviews.Author: Jay White
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a year- at first I thought it was wonderful- what a deal- but after less than a year the sound is going out-- sounds like the cone is cracked or loose...

Reviews.Title: Sceptre E325BV-HDH 32-inch
Reviews.Author: William T. Trobaugh
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our daughter & son-in-law as a Christmas gift, and they are extremely happy with the quality of the picture and the over all looks as well as the input/output features. Shipping was quick and the sale price was great.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Edward Armendariz
Reviews.Content: This unit works well visually, the only issue is the tin can sounding speakers it has.I hooked up a pair of old PC speakers to the external plug, and now it is a good experience.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre E325BV-HDH-32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (black)
Reviews.Author: Ronald Nederostek
Reviews.Content: secptre hdtv good color, very easyn to assemble, good  item for the bedroom. it was easy to set up and program everything

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Joe J Chvatal
Reviews.Content: Purchased for a replacement TV in a spare room.  Great picture quality for the price.  Easy to setup.  Would recommend for purchase.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Bruce D. Taranto "Big B"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my girlfriend as a Christmas present. She loves it and I love it....Its very thin, and so far no issues whatsoever. The sound is surprisingly loud as well.....I would buy this again.....

Reviews.Title: previous reviews were very accurate
Reviews.Author: Sarah M. Smith
Reviews.Content: tv looks great and works great -- only flaw is the sound system, which is remedied with a pair of speakers.

Reviews.Title: good TV for a bedroom
Reviews.Author: Rod Knier
Reviews.Content: A good basic TV - got this for my son for his bedroom - the quality is good and the screen is clear. I think in a larger room it may not be up to my desires but for a small room it does a good job.

Reviews.Title: So far, awesome!
Reviews.Author: Catherine Calhoun
Reviews.Content: Thus far, this is a great product. Works exactly like it says it will, sets up easily, easy to attach other devices to. I've only had it since the beginning of December, so I cannot speak for its' longevity. Nevertheless, it is a fabulous upgrade from my 8 million pound ancient Toshiba.4-26-13Still love it. Good picture, works great with other devices. Added an Apple TV box to it, got a digital antenna. Now I don't need cable and it only costs me $20/month for all the entertainment I can eat.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: I have been using this set for several weeks now and I am glad I made this purchase. It's good value for the money. Setup is pretty easy, the picture and sound are both good quality and I particularly like that there are several different settings for both. Also, it has the capability to connect multiple devices. The only problem that I encountered it that it does not pick up any local channels but I attribute that to my location so I'll probably order the leaf antenna that I read about here. Thanks to earlier reviewers who posted such detailed info on this product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael Bernardo "shippingfool"
Reviews.Content: Solid television for not a lot of money.  Clean picture.  Sound is not going to blow you away, but it is good enough.  What really gives it the 5 stars is it has 3 hdmi inputs.  I see tv's going for double, triple the price with only 2, which is just not enough in my opinion.  You need one for your hd television, one for a blu-ray, and one for your gaming or other device.  Having two just makes things a big pain.  No issues at all since purchase.

Reviews.Title: IT'S GOT IT WHERE IT COUNTS
Reviews.Author: Adipatus Sutapida
Reviews.Content: Great quality image and sound. Attractive looking. The software is very spiffy. Does not look cheap at all, even though it's inexpensive. It works as a tv and a computer monitor. led. hd. With hdmi connections.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: mikesummer
Reviews.Content: More than I expected for what I paid for it, Lots of features and picture is super. Bought it on cyber Monday and got a hell of a deal. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV. Great Price.
Reviews.Author: Knightdale Nick
Reviews.Content: This was for our bedroom and was absolutely perfect. Under $300 and LED was just what we wanted. Not a single problem so far...

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Babycakes
Reviews.Content: Great television.  We don't have cable and get mediocre TV reception, but my old VCR and DVD movies look incredible.  Best picture ever.  I do have to agree with some reviewers that it does not get very loud, but we have a quiet house, so not a problem.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: kate
Reviews.Content: This is my first HD TV-even though my tube tv still had a great picture(after 12 yrs)-decided to go for the HD.  First of all the picture is ok-but unless you are only 5 feet away-don't really see the full HD effect.  Also must view it head on as any viewing from an angle you see a washed out picture.  The audio stinks, but I have surround sound so that is not an issue with me.  I have not had any other problems as stated in some of the other reviews. End result is it will suffice until I can afford a better quality one and will probably move this one to my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: TV for the wife.
Reviews.Author: daanderson911
Reviews.Content: My wife loves to cook and bake - and while she spends her time doing so, she prefers to have "background noise".  I considered buying a better radio for the kitchen, but for the price we got in this TV, it was a must-have. Neither of us have looked back since.

Reviews.Title: Looks Good!
Reviews.Author: inkycu
Reviews.Content: Looks good...sounds good...good price...it's a keeper! It was on sale so I got the additional 3 yrear portection plan.buy buy

Reviews.Title: not happy with sound
Reviews.Author: elinor dilatush
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is good, but sound is AWFUL - if I were younger I would have packed it up and sent it back....

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Scott Smith
Reviews.Content: TV went into my sons room and works perfectly for tv, movies and gaming.  The sound isn't superb, but it is on par with what you get on any modern tv today.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: eddy1
Reviews.Content: shipping was quick. looks great and i would buy it again.... i recommend it to everyone. looking to see if they make a bigger size..

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Picture is clean and bright. Great product for the price. I'm tempted to buy the 42 inch next time around.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre E325BV-HDH 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Myra Blackerby
Reviews.Content: I do like this TV, but don't understand why there is a wait for the screen to come on.  Once it's on, it's fine.

Reviews.Title: Bought this TV and didnt know what to expect
Reviews.Author: bilbo
Reviews.Content: So I bought this on sale, and didnt know what to expect. I think for the price I paid on sale it was definately worth the price.I recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Amazing television at an amazing price!!!
Reviews.Author: Tony R.
Reviews.Content: I honestly wasn't expecting much from a sub-$200 off-brand, but I can honestly say I have been blown away by not only the picture quality and price, but by the whole experience. Quick shipping with Prime, excellent packaging, clearly labeled and properly packaged installation hardware, even included a nice little Phillips screwdriver! Television/remote has all the functions I could ever need, inputs galore and even sound level is adequate for a larger bedroom in my opinion. I'm not planning on blasting music through this thing and waking the kids :), but a really great TV for the bedroom, which easily stands above many of the better known brands out there (Samsung, LG, etc.) at a fraction of the price of there comparable 32" models. I have recommended this TV to several friends and will definitely look for Sceptre in the future.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got one of these TV's and was so happy with the picture and sound quality that I purchased a second as soon as they had them in stock again!  Price is excellent and quality exceeds my expectations!

Reviews.Title: Muy buena televisión
Reviews.Author: Hector Julio Valdez Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: excelente precio con la calidad en la imagen que da comparándolas con las otras principales marcas (samsung, Lg, Sony etc). Ademas que es LED con un consumo ideal....totalmente recomendable.

Reviews.Title: Received in excellent condition
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: Very good condition, 3 HDMI ports, and VGA, awkward cable hook up spotPicture and sound are very good for the priceWould recommend

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for price point.
Reviews.Author: Craig Hertzler "Craig H."
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV ($180) after doing a lot of research for a 32 inch LED TV (for my kitchen, if that matters.)  Sceptre has been around for several decades and are a reputable brand.  I'm pleased with slender form factor, the picture and the TV tuner.  I don't know if there's much difference between TV tuners.  However, the Sceptre has been much more reliable picking up an over-the-air transmission than my expensive Samsung.  Considering that I was mainly looking for a TV with a good picture, I very happy with this.  As others have said, the audio is average with the headphone jack being essentially worthless (really really terrible.)  However, for a smaller space (like a kitchen) the audio is fine.  I haven't tested out all the other audio options but I plan to do so and report back.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Dave in IA
Reviews.Content: I bought this at Christmas as a present for another room and just recently set it up. I am currently just using an antenna until I run new caling for cable TV. The quick guide made it easy and the picture is very good for rabbit ears. I have an inexpensive DVD player hooked up and the picture is as good as you would expect for 720. I have been very satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Online shopper
Reviews.Content: The TV has been great thus far! My first flat screen, and the LED I like a lot. Sharp, clear images. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: David N. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I loved it, I have two Samsung's 42" And 50", and the TV blows them away. May buy another for my other bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great product for AWESOME PRICE
Reviews.Author: tgait
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv. I love it. I love watching movies on it, and I like the fact that I only paid under 200 for it. Great purchase overall!

Reviews.Title: Have 2 of them
Reviews.Author: hillbillygoat
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with tv. I have one for a year now. use it in my van when I am night watching at a coal mine. I got one for my father in law where he night watch's. Only neg is the sound needs improving.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for price!
Reviews.Author: Robert Kubik
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a tube TV in my mancave. Using it with some Logitech Z130 speakers. Very pleased with picture quality, especially considering what I paid for it. Could be a little easier to delete channels from memory thats the only fault I can find.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Rivera Nava
Reviews.Content: I'm not a TV expert nor a picky person so all I will say is that I wouldn't expect more for less that $200, the TV looks great physically, has a very good and sharp image, have to say that I haven't used it with cable or air tv, I have only used it to play movies, shows and videos connected to my computer using an HDMI cable, also I'm using an external speaker system and sounds great.Another user uploaded a couple of pictures where it shows bright lights between in the frame and the screen in the bottom and have to say that I see them too.Again you can't expect more for less than $200, so if you are a picky person and want the best of the best you always have the option to buy a TV that costs $2000 or more.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Jason Sturgeon "OS Addict"
Reviews.Content: Works well in our guest bedroom. We are using the built-in tuner with basic cable. I have not tested out the other input options yet. Sounds pretty good for a small tv and it's very thin with lots of inputs for the price.

Reviews.Title: WOW GREAT PICTURE.
Reviews.Author: jason vo
Reviews.Content: GOT IT FOR 200 AND FREE S/H.  NICE PICTURE BUT POOR SOUND QUALITY.  NO PROBLEM IF UR USING EXTERNAL A SPEAKER.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Television for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Diane Rose Vezzani
Reviews.Content: This television was ordered as a Christmas present for my son.  The picture quality is great, and the size is just right for a bedroom.  The sale price was right at $200 - couldn't ask for a better t.v. for the money!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Monitor
Reviews.Author: Ale-B
Reviews.Content: For the price this monitor is a knock-out and the games on the Xbox are crisp and vibrant.videos look great also.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for an excellent price
Reviews.Author: Henry Pena
Reviews.Content: This TV was my father-in-law Christmas gift and he really loves it. About the price I just can say... Excellent.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: tavella
Reviews.Content: I remembered Sceptre's name from computer monitors and I was a little unsure about this. The price was right and the picture is great. Bought it as a gift. Very happy I did.

Reviews.Title: promptness
Reviews.Author: Abangolee
Reviews.Content: Vendor is very prompt and the product is excellent. I love this TV set. It exactly what it says online. You can connect hdmi,, blu ray and even go online if your blu ray has  wifive

Reviews.Title: My evaluation of this product
Reviews.Author: Brenda Rice
Reviews.Content: The picture is so clear and we noticed the difference with other televisions .  The picture quality is amazing.  I was so surprised.  The sound quality is very good for the location that we have it.  A sound bar was not needed.  I would highly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: lynnieg14
Reviews.Content: I was nervous about buying a Sceptre TV when some of the reviews on here were not so good, but my awesome SONY TV had just broken and I am a poor college student and needed something cheap. The only problem I have had with it so far is sometimes it randomly changes sources in the middle of a show or while I am using the cable remote, which can get annoying.. not sure if it's the TV or maybe a ghost (lol!).. Sometimes it's not the most reliable thing in the world, and if you have a little more money to spare I would buy a better made TV, like SONY or LG or something.. But so far, none of the major problems others on here have said, but I have only had it for about 3 months so far...

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: William Davis
Reviews.Content: I never rate products but this tv is one of my best deals ever.  Side by side comparisons with my Samsung led 46 " I would pick the Sceptre picture. The connectivity options are amazing. After playing with all the adjustments I left most at the factory settings,even leaving the dynamic setting off. The picture from over the air setting is just as impressive with standard  broadcasts being very good. My criteria  for tv's has always been the brightness of the white's and accuracy of the reds. This tv has both.The sound is not too bad but I hooked up a 2.1 to the headphone jack which sounds great.The 200$ price I paid in early December was an amazing deal . The 4 star rating  is because of the slight flashlight effect at the bottom left of the screen. Visible only in the darkest screen ,I can overlook this for the stunning picture 98% of the time.If Sceptre could address this problem it would be a definite 5

Reviews.Title: Sceptre HDTV
Reviews.Author: Deborah Smith
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is okay. The sound quality needs work. Will need to buy a sound bar.  In all a good tv for the money.

Reviews.Title: Crisp and vivid but lacks quality sound.
Reviews.Author: KMN
Reviews.Content: Screen is bright and crisp but the audio lacks the oomph of other TVs. Add a soundbar or external source to it and you are all set. Other than that no qualms about it.

Reviews.Title: My BF loves it!
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for my boyfriend for christmas. He had been telling me that he wanted a 32" tv to improve his gaming experience. (PS3 games) He has had it for a few weeks now and he can't be any more ecstatic about it. For not being 1080p, it looks great! It's very thin and light. It's definitely WELL worth the price here on Amazon. I absolutely would recommend this to anyone looking for a decent priced 32" tv

Reviews.Title: We like it.
Reviews.Author: Nukumach
Reviews.Content: It works just fine for us. We just upgrated from a very old tv so this is great. Worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Good Value for the Money
Reviews.Author: Gregory A. Stec
Reviews.Content: This TV is a good value, with crisp picture and true colors. Like many other flat screens, the sound can be tinny. But boosting the bass helps. Overall, it's a solid performer for the money.

Reviews.Title: sceptre tv
Reviews.Author: Christy C. Franks "Christy"
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this tv. excellent picture quality. Easy to use and lots of ports for hooking in your dvd or camcorders.

Reviews.Title: outstanding
Reviews.Author: Gary A. Marzolf
Reviews.Content: Absolutely beyond expectations. A terrific picture. Hoping for good reliability. A little apprehensive about buying a non name brand product. It replaced a 28" 1080P tv. Thought picture quality being a 720 would be possibly inferior. It isn't. Read a few articles saying the average person cannot differentiate between 720 & 1080 p tv's if they are under 42". Seems as though they new what they were talking about.

Reviews.Title: LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: PJ Mahoney
Reviews.Content: I chose 4 stars do to the price and shipment performance. High quality TV, never heard of the brand name but so far very good. Ask me again in about a year.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Sam and Max
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen TV (I know, welcome to the 21st century already huh?) While other reviews indicate it's a good TV for a bedroom, I have it sitting proudly in the middle of my living area. Picture is fine, setup was super easy, and programming my directv remote to work on it was a breeze. And the couch is about 6 feet from the TV. I'm not sure why this set should be relegated to the bedroom!

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Jerome James
Reviews.Content: i got this with black Friday sale and it was worth every dollar. Just needed a surround sound system and u are good to go.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Violet J. Berry "university history major and...
Reviews.Content: This is one of my best on-line buys. The quality of the picture is very good as well as the sound.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: T Voisard
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived ahead of scheduled delivery. I am very impressed with the picture quality and the sound quality is better than expected. The blacks are deep and rich and the whites very bright. I was a little hesitant purchasing a 720p, especially from a company I had not heard of, but this TV has proven well worth the price (which was below other sets of the same size and resolution).I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good value for price
Reviews.Author: Ouch
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality and is exactly what I was looking for.  Fit's great mounted on wall in our game room.

Reviews.Title: Best 32'' TV I've ever owned
Reviews.Author: C. ZHANG
Reviews.Content: I'm a college kid. Major is computers. Very well versed in consumer technology. This thing is the REAL DEAL. I got this for $175 during 2012 Thanksgiving. Solid and very very happy with my purchase. Quality is equal or surpassing Samsung's, but only at maybe 25% of what a Samsung would've costed. Buy it please!

Reviews.Title: Really good TV
Reviews.Author: Amazonian pal
Reviews.Content: I also own a 42inch sharp LCD and actually I prefer this TV over the Sharp. The Sharp is 1020p HD but still once you play with both color settings this one is brighter and well sharper lol They are both inexpensive models but this I think is better. I like the LED better too because I can tell it stays cooler longer because of the low wattage. Also my Sharp doesn't have a swivel stand like this one. I like some of the preset or adjustable features on this one and all the inputs are useful.  I tried hooking my Ipad up with the USB, doesn't work. Also its not full HD. Those are the two main reason I gave it a 4. I also like the sound but I use in in my bedroom so its not that far away from me. For the price I don't think you can find a better 32in TV..

Reviews.Title: got it for moms christmas present
Reviews.Author: David Felder
Reviews.Content: she absolutly loves it , easy to operate , excelent picture , cant beat it for the price , her last t.v. was a 1984 sony

Reviews.Title: Great LED TV
Reviews.Author: Nathan Scott Jardine
Reviews.Content: I received the TV on time and in good condition. It is super thin and sleek. The picture looks great, and the sound is a good as can be expected for how slim it is.

Reviews.Title: It's good.
Reviews.Author: K. Y. Park "Honest"
Reviews.Content: It's good compared with price.But it didn't work when I tried to connect and use the wireless headset.I was dissapointed of this point.Except this point, I satisfied of this item.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Alan Johnson
Reviews.Content: This was a great TV at a great price. We added speakers for better sound. It was easy to set-up

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Phyllis
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase.  The reviews helped a lot to decide on this one, and I'm not sorry.  The picture is great, and sound is good. Faster shipping than I expected!

Reviews.Title: wow picture is awesome
Reviews.Author: Steve Malcolm
Reviews.Content: bought this for my daughters room, when i cut it on i immediately wanted one for my room cause i have a old crt but when i came back, the seller who i bought it from for 207 was sold out now its over 300 so ill wait until another seller comes around with that price range, but overall 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Great Value for a $200 TV
Reviews.Author: Dan Francis
Reviews.Content: TV works great has a good picture and decent sound perfect for a bedroom or kids room. For the living room I would pay the extra money for a premium television

Reviews.Title: Good: HDMI, PC, HD Tuner. Bad: SD Tuner
Reviews.Author: A. Parker
Reviews.Content: This is a great little TV, but some words of caution as well.Good:> Works very well as a bedroom TV. Very thin design, lightweight.> Great picture quality with PC input, HDMI, HD Tuner. Just as good or better than Samsungs that I own on these inputs.> Sound is not great, but does decently well.> Price was incredible. Bought for $180, free shipping w/ Prime.> Packed well. Others have said that they hit the touchpoints, and they do. They include a nice Microfiber cloth to clean the TV, as well as a screwdriver to install the base.Bad:> SD tuner is really poor quality with some channels. Before you say it's my cable or the splitter, know that I tried it on a number of settings. Some channels were ok, but there were lots of signs of interference on the SD channels. Nothing on the HDMI, PC, or HD Tuner channels. Just know about this if you're planning to use only for a coaxial connection and need SD channels. Not a big issue for me--I have a cable box with this TV.> There are some small distortions of light around where the speakers are placed in the TV. Not a big issue, but you do notice it when the screen fades entirely to black.> This is a small detail, but the manual is written in decidedly poor English. As you're buying an off brand TV, it doesn't instill much confidence. Further, I looked up the SD tuner issue, and the answer provided was basically "this TV is soooooo amazing that it picks up distortions you didn't even know you had." My other HD TVs don't display such distortions, so that was a little bit hollow.> No optical audio port. There is a regular stereo headphone port if you want to put speakers in. Not a big deal for me. It's not a great sounding TV, but it's a bedroom TV that cost $180, so won't fault for that.Verdict:> If you get this TV for $200 or below I think it's a good buy. I've really enjoyed mine. Just know about the SD Tuner issue going in. People may complain also about the Sceptre logo that pops up, but it's not that big of a deal really.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Darcie Dee Epling
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV for our bedroom.  The picture quality is great. I was a little nervous because it's only a 720p, but we can't tell the difference between this TV and the 1080p in the living room.  This may be beacuse of the difference in size.  Whatever the reason, this was a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "ktipmeyer"
Reviews.Content: Up and running without problems right away.  I don't have HD on the satellite dish but the picture is good.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre E325BV-HDH
Reviews.Author: E. Jackson
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift, therefore I've not used it. That said, I will add that the price was right, reviews were good, shipping and communication were excellent. Good buy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey L Moore
Reviews.Content: This TV has far exceeded my expectations.  If you just have cable and not a cable box then the TV quality won't be very good because you can't use hdmi connection.  Don't worry about 1080p at this size TV for Xbox etc as long as you use HDMI or you will be disappointed.  I think that goes for all televisions.  I highly reccomend this TV for a main TV or a bedroom/basement TV.  If this size is good for you the price is great.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Dave B.
Reviews.Content: connected this to my cable box, dvd player, and wii with no problems.  tried to connect to the pc using hdmi but the sound and audio are out of sync but I think it's an issue with the pc and bot the tv.

Reviews.Title: Bad sound
Reviews.Author: James L. Barber
Reviews.Content: The sound quality is very tinny. You can really tell the difference between this TV and the others I own.Also, there is not return to previous channel, which is very annoying.Pay a little extra and get something better.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Like most others, i was hesitant to purchase a 'no name brand' TV. However i did a little research, coupled with the great 5 and 4 star rating and super low price, i bought it. It delivers more than i ever expected. I am comfortable with the picture quality and the sound is quite loud (despite others saying the audio is poor). I am only hoping it will last for a long time to come. The only negative that resulted in a 4 star rating is the remote sensor. The only way to actually get it to register is to point it directly at the bottom right corner of the TV where the receiver sensor is. It becomes a bit annoying but i can live with it considering all the perks.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality TV for PC or Wii
Reviews.Author: Matthew Justin Haney "Christian"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV to use as a PC monitor (not via the PC Monitor hook up, but via the HDMI 1 hook up) and at the same time as a TV for my Wii (via the RCA hook ups). It was super simple to set up, all I have to do to switch between the two is hit the "Source" button on the remote and go between "AV" and "HDMI 1". For a no-name-brand, everything about this screams quality. I love that there are buttons on the side of the TV (in case you can't find the remote) to do the basic functions. The base allows it to swivel easily from left to right, which I use when I switch it from PC (straight forward) to Wii (swiveled to the right) so my kids can sit on the bed and play. Came with a free screw driver too.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: E. Lail
Reviews.Content: I love the picture and quality of construction! The sound sucks pretty bad on the TV, so i'm using a sound bar to compensate. For the price you cant beat it. All in all, im pretty satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the money!!!
Reviews.Author: Thor
Reviews.Content: This TV is for my 8 & 5 yr old daughters for their Wii and DVD player. I am very happy with the picture and sound quality, especially for the price we paid for the TV. I would buy another one in an instant.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch hdtv
Reviews.Author: S. Reeder
Reviews.Content: I was looking for the largest tv that would fit into an existing piece of furniture - and this was it.  Easy to set up, great sound and picture.

Reviews.Title: Great for more than what I paid for it.
Reviews.Author: Popsc6
Reviews.Content: Bought this on black Friday for $179. Very pleased with picture quality and overall performance. Slim design and lightweight make it attractive and easy to install. ( I mounted it on the wall )720p is fine at 32", an ideal tv for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for price
Reviews.Author: Jackie Mewes
Reviews.Content: I gave this TV as a gift to my daughter for Christmas.  She loves it and says it has a good picture etc.  She lives out in the country and does not have cable but gets 6 public channels and the TV is set up with a systerm where she doesn't have to use a box like she did on her older, much older TV.  The price was amazing for a 32" TV.  I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this tv. It has great color and the picture is very crisp and clear. Very good value for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for what it is
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey S
Reviews.Content: I took a chance and bought this TV as an upgrade from the old analog TV that my kids were using for gaming and video streaming. It has a great picture (really, it's stellar for a 720p), and the LED power is even across the entire screen. Besides the price, the selling point for me was the fact that it had three HDMI ports in addition to all the others. I would have given it five stars, but the sound is pretty tinny, even when using the built-in mixer; so consider picking up at least a small soundbar to go along with it.

Reviews.Title: Good image, very crisp.  Ugly in screen menu. Cheap remote. Tv quality and looking very nice.
Reviews.Author: rafael
Reviews.Content: The tv has a beautifull black brushed, that seems really nice, sadly the cheap remote and the on the screen menu are a drawback, but i have to admit that the screen really sorprised me with the beautifull colors ans the very crisp image. Very nice led hstv for $179.00!

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Shawn Jess
Reviews.Content: I buy many products online. Television was bought for a Christmas present for my son. Product came well packaged, and is working beautifully day 1. Picture and sound are good for our liking. I have purchased 2 Samsung HDTV's and a Sony HDTV. The picture on this 32" is very comparable given the price.

Reviews.Title: NIce
Reviews.Author: Shell-bell
Reviews.Content: Its not spetacular! Awesome for the price! sound is ok but not great . picture alittle on the blue led side cant fix it that i can tell.

Reviews.Title: Buy this one!!
Reviews.Author: AK
Reviews.Content: Pros:Excellent picture, (clear and crisp, no ghosting, accurate color.)3 HDMI inputs, pc input, usb port. (media)Remote laid out well, good touch, many shortcut options like screen aspect ratio, guide and info for tv.Excellent tv digital tuner.Cons:As with other reviews of this device, Bad sound, from speakers and headphone out put both. That is the only reason it is not a 5 star. Most people have a stereo or surround system with an aux input, and if sound is taken from rca jacks, it is fine.Also as with another review, there are a couple of small blotched spots at the bottom of the screen, but primarily noticeable only when the screen is blank. You have to look really hard to see them when the picture is on, and you can only notice them with certain color combinations, and then you had better be paying close, close attention to those spots and not the program you are watching. So they are transient and hardly noticable even when they are there. Not a reason at all to downgrade this TV in my opinion, considering the price.Price:I got this at the Black Friday price of about $180.00. I was leary of the name, but the price and reviews finally convinced me. I have looked at vizios, samsungs, etc. and this TV is comparable to the other LED models I have seen in picture quality. The others were running $250 to $350 at the time. Now they are all around $400.00 with the same specs.Recommendation:I don't know how this TV will hold up in the long run, but if you are debating between this lesser known brand and a more major one, and the price difference is significant, go with this one!!

Reviews.Title: awesome tv
Reviews.Author: tim de haro
Reviews.Content: when i came on amazon on black friday i planned on buying a 32 inch tv for $100 but then i saw the sceptre for $179 and read all of it's reviews.The $100 tv wasn't that good.It only had four comments and all of them were bad.So i thought I'd give the sceptre a try and i have no regrets.This tv is awesome.The picture is great, the size is perfect for my room and the sound is really good.I was worried because when i looked at all the pictures of the tv they said there may be a slight discoloration on the bottom of the screen but it looks great.You can't go wrong with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Awesome! TV
Reviews.Author: David Messado
Reviews.Content: No regrets, TV exceeded my expectations. I recommend this product wholeheartedly, its simply amazing. The picture quality is superb, the sound is surprisingly good and the various options just makes it rival the samsung in my opinion. Great buy

Reviews.Title: not in use, but so far so good
Reviews.Author: Teri Malone
Reviews.Content: purchased for spare bedroom, so it will not get a lot of use. the testing worked well.fits well in the space allocated.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre TV
Reviews.Author: Jackie Collins
Reviews.Content: My husband and I really enjoy the clarity and the easy-to-use features of this television. Great product!  We would recommend it for someone on a budget who wants high quality.  The unit is quite slim, which will be ideal when we install it over the mantle.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Miraj
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV from Costco about 4 months ago. It wasn't available in Amazon at that time. This is a great budget TV. The picture quality is excellent. I haven't noticed any problems with this TV. I was a little reluctant to buy this TV as Sceptre was an off-brand. However, the majority of the reviews (like those in Walmart) was telling me that it was a great one. I love this TV..!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price.
Reviews.Author: hcook
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to replace a ancient floor model tv.  Very good TV. Good picture and good sound.  Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Ricky
Reviews.Content: The Sceptre TV arrived before the estimated delivery date; it was easy to attach the stand and so far we are very satisfied with watching shows on it.

Reviews.Title: High quality, amazing for price.
Reviews.Author: ttop12
Reviews.Content: I don't normally leave reviews, but this is an excellent product. For the price, I'm really pleasantly surprised by the result. Compared to the other 32 in. out there, this is a super class TV with clear picture.-t

Reviews.Title: my purchase
Reviews.Author: Tonya
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the television that I p purchased. It arrived on time and it was exactly what I wanted. It was also priced right.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: myron
Reviews.Content: sharp picture product exceeded expectations. love the product it has excellent picture quality. I would recommend the product to others.

Reviews.Title: Flat screen Tv
Reviews.Author: Yeee
Reviews.Content: It's alright the quality ain't that great it's very quiet but hey you get what you pay for right? At least I'm watching something rather than nothing

Reviews.Title: A nice tv
Reviews.Author: Stephen R Maggard
Reviews.Content: This is a quality item at a good price.  The item was as described and sent out fast. A good black friday buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Arkansas Traveler
Reviews.Content: This TV is very thin and lightweight and has a good picture and sound. For 180.00 including shipping you can’t beat it.We purchased this for permanent installation in our travel trailer. The black plastic cover for stand was removed. There is a smaller metal stand under the black cover. The metal stand was painted black and bolted to existing TV shelf. A simple HDTV wall-mounting bracket supports the back with custom cut 11/8” square wooden spacers. This provides the appropriate depth between the wall and the TV when the back edge of the metal stand is against the back wall.  It travels very well.

Reviews.Title: new toy
Reviews.Author: Michael S. Bacile
Reviews.Content: Everything you want, good picture good antenna reception and good remote that is fast, I lie to surf. Only reason it got four stars was the small font on screen. It's been a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: sceptre 32 led
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: Although the picture color was nice and bright there were 3 dead pixels along with greenish/yellow blotch areas all around the screen (when on) and the ones around the edge's could be seen while watching any channel.Bad quality on mine and it went back immediately,refund only didnt want to chance another one.

Reviews.Title: Better Than Expected!
Reviews.Author: TJF
Reviews.Content: Not only was the item packaged very well for safe shipment, the item was dummy proof for assembly with the kit including everything needed including a magnetic screw! The picture quality looks awesome too! Much better quality than expected from an unknown company. Woul highly reccomend!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Hercules
Reviews.Content: I have known the Brand by their Pc Monitors. This is an exceptional buy, best value for the money on this LED class TV. The picture is vivid and bright. The form factor I adore is beautiful and High end looking with it's narrow frame . I would recommend this item to anyone.Roland H

Reviews.Title: Sceptor LED TV
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Nice picture and easy setup. Did have one bad HDMI port but have two more so no big deal.Great value.

Reviews.Title: buy this tv
Reviews.Author: john carter
Reviews.Content: this tv was a great deal and was surprising in its preformance. the delivery was on time all parts were there.All in all a pleasant experence

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: KV
Reviews.Content: I wa using this tv for past 1 month and no issues till now. When I connect to laptop, sometime the sound is minimal, but I have no issues with that since I have external speakers. Picture is perfect for the price.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong on this one
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great price, free shipping,easy set up.Digital stations come in as good as high def..the sound could be a bit better.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre
Reviews.Author: Adog
Reviews.Content: Ey good all around, I got it for cheap plus its real good quality I have no complaints at all, good job guys

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: speedballz
Reviews.Content: I didn't have some of the issues that other reviewers were having, such as pixels dead on arrival or the PC resolution problem. I use this for extra desktop space with my laptop and it works great. The refresh rate is a little slow if I'm watching an action movie and it has no optical audio output, but other than that it does everything my samsung did, with slightly less in the picture quality department. No big complaints though.

Reviews.Title: TV good- the products recommended as buy with, did not go with this TV
Reviews.Author: KAREN SPRINGFIELD
Reviews.Content: The TV works good. However I was very disappointed that the recommended mount did not fit this TV. Because of this I had to make adjustments and change out another larger TV for the space that I intended to use this one. Also, Amazon recommended that I purchase a USB cable that was included in with the TV so I paid for an item I didn't need.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre E325 BV HD TV
Reviews.Author: Bald Otter
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my basement, great picture, easy set up, and looks nice. Great tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: far from crystal clear.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Innerfield
Reviews.Content: I may be far from a expert when it comes to TVs but i really expected better picture quality then I am getting.  I replaced a 10 year old 19 inch box tv with this and it seems like the picture is no clearer.  Larger yes, clearer or better quality not really.On the plus side, the sound is rather good, it was easy to set up and get going.  I don't know whether I just had my expectations to high but like I said, it was way blurrier then I expected.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 32" TV review.
Reviews.Author: Septy
Reviews.Content: Great purchase. Only 2 negatives. The 4 foot power cord was too short to reach our outlet. Had to use a 6 foot power cord. The other negative was the assembly of the base was harder than it needed to be because the holes for the screws didn't line up very good. No negatives on the important part - the tv picture exceeded expectations.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 32 Inch from Amazon - Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Jerry S - Phoenix
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an inexpensive TV for my bedroom.  The quality of this unit met every expectation I could have.  The setup was very simple and when I connected it to my satelite, it was flawless.  Amazon had a great price and the delivery was exactly as promised.  I would highly recommend this set and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Lauri Murphy
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant when purchasing this TV. The price was to good to be true. I am so happy I purchased this television.  The color and clarity are great. I would recommend this to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Rachel Ennis
Reviews.Content: I bought this on Black Friday because the price was pretty amazing for a 32 inch TV. I had never heard of the Sceptre brand before, so I found their website,did a little research & decided to go for it. Couldn't be happier. It's a great looking TV. You won't be disappointed with it.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: fatidan
Reviews.Content: I am in Afghanistan as a contractor it is nice to have this make me feel more at home when I get off work after my 12 hr shift

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent TV for the price, and it has pretty good definition and works great. I'm glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 32 in LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mary Jo Gregston
Reviews.Content: This TV is a good buy for the money.  Fast shhipping.  Easy to set up and nice picture.  Would buy another

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV. Great price.
Reviews.Author: NykkiB
Reviews.Content: I'm so glad I came across this product. This TV is great for my dorm room and barely set me back anything. This is my first flat screen/flat monitor television and I am impressed. I love that it starts up silently unlike my old televisions and it's super light and doesn't take up a lot of space. The picture quality is fine; all of my shows come out clear. The sound isn't very loud but I don't like watching television very loud anyway so it's fine for me. Hook up wasn't complicated at all. My only complaint is that the port for the coaxial cable is in a bad position so it's hard to screw that in.

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV, Great Value
Reviews.Author: Rich Markson "don mark"
Reviews.Content: The performance of this TV's exceeds my expectation. What I thought would be relatively mediocre ,instead, turned out to produce vibrant picture and good sound quality. Plus, the Black Friday price $180 makes the deal even sweeter. I would definitely recommend this TV to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great bargain
Reviews.Author: Steve Wallaker
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price. I bought it for a spare bedroom. Good picture and sound. I would recommend this unit to anyone looking for a inexpensive set.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: jhminix
Reviews.Content: I was able to snag this during black Friday weekend for $179 free shipping.  Believe me it is worth more.  Picture is clear and picks up over 100 analog and digital channels through my internet company (not even paying for tv, but just plug it in and do channel search and tv is available!) Ok i do have one complaint.  Not enough to justify 4 stars though.  When i plug it up to laptop through hdmi, tv supports a max 1360x768 instead of advertised 1366x768.  That's only 6 pixels on the edge so no big deal.  The picture is still very clear from my laptop.  Clearer than any other lcd tv i have tried to plug it into.  Figures as I believe Sceptre started out as a monitor company if I am not mistaken.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Frederick Steve
Reviews.Content: I got this set after moving to replace an old TV.  While it is not hooked to HD it has performed well and so far I have no issues with the sound quality.  Good deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: jennie frizzell
Reviews.Content: I chose four stars because I never give anything a perfect score. It is a great deal for the price. Have had it for over a month and have not had any problems with it. It only took two days for it to arrive using only standard shipping! I bought it for my husband for his birthday, and he is thrilled with it. We live in a fifth wheel and it is the perfect size for our space. I would recommend this to anyone on a budget, or anyone wanting to make a wise purchase during the current state of the economy.

Reviews.Title: Great picture for the cost
Reviews.Author: Julie Becker
Reviews.Content: I think this TV was a bargain.  It has a great picture, very easy to set up.  Only complaint is that the sound isn't great.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Vinny B.
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv, and the price is amazing! The colors are awesome, and the picture is great! Very happy.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME TV OK SOUND
Reviews.Author: Dyrick Deboard "DEBO"
Reviews.Content: I WAS GOING TO PURCHASE THIS TV THROUGH AMAZON ON BLACK FRIDAY - HOWEVER I DID NOT AND REGRET IT - ANYWAY - I ENDED UP PURCHASING THIS TV THROUGH WALMART ONLINE FOR 219.00 ABOUT 3 WEEKS AGO - SO FAR I LOVE THIS TV - I RECENTLY CREATED A MAN CAVE AND IT WAS PERFECT FOR IT - PICTURE QUIALTY IS AMAZING - MY ONLY GRIPE IS THE SOUND - IT IS A LITTLE ON THE POOR SIDE - I THEN PURCHASED A PHILLIPS SOUND BAR AND SUBWOLFER SYTEM AND HAVE BEEN AMAZED EVERY SINCE - GREAT TV FOR PRICE - WILL BE BUYING A SECOND ONE

Reviews.Title: Unbelievably good!
Reviews.Author: C. B. Banks
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV to use for my workouts. It is replacing a big clunky JVC which was so boring to watch that my workouts suffered. This TV is lightweight and has a huge viewing area since the bezel is so thin. The sound is quite adequate also.  It was easy to assemble and setup using an HDMI cable (not included). I also have a larger LG HDTV 1080p and I think the picture is just as good on this 32 inch 720p. I did notice that my AT&T; u-Verse remote was easily set using the Sony HDTV "code." Made me wonder if this TV was an off-brand of Sony. Good looking and provides a great picture. Not to mention an excellent price at under $200!

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Janice T.
Reviews.Content: It's a great bedroom television for the price.  Looks good, sounds good.  I've had no problems in the month or so I've had it.

Reviews.Title: fine except for discoloration issue
Reviews.Author: Phillip Z.
Reviews.Content: The first TV I ordered had a strange glow on the bottom left and right corners whenever the screen was black or dark.I sent this TV back.  Amazon was great about sending a replacement the next day!The replacement seemed to look decent when I turned it on.  WIthin 30 minutes, the same discoloration appeared.  After about a week of use, the glow appears sometimes and is otherwise absent.  Other reviewers noted the same problem.  I wonder how many of these TVs have this manufacturing issue, since I had the same problem TWICE!Other than this one, major issue (which some people may not find too distracting), my Playstation games, Netflix movies, and Hulu shows look fine.  Sound isn't great, but enough for a small room.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Sheree
Reviews.Content: The reviews were accurate. I am loving it. Simple to connect although I initially didn't tune the tv imput correctly and had to watch  in AV mode with dvd player on.  But soon figured out my mistake.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture!
Reviews.Author: Mike in Al
Reviews.Content: Great pricing, crisp clear picture with deep rich blacks, this is easily the equivalent of much more expensive sets. It took only a minute or two to set up, the connections were very clearly labeled. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Glenda Niles
Reviews.Content: I have had no problems so far. It was easy to set up and my daughter enjoys using it to play her Wii games as well as to go on the internet to watch videos etc. We are happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Poulos
Reviews.Content: Nice TV, great price, just as good as the more expensive models we looked at! Arrived very fast, nicely packaged, easy to set up -- would buy more for the house.

Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD
Reviews.Author: MiamiMin
Reviews.Content: We've only had it for a few weeks, but it seems to be an excellent buy so far.  The picture quality is excellent and even though the sound quality could be better, it's certainly adequate.  Let me put it this way, since we installed this one, we have ordered two more Sceptre sets - another 32-inch and a 42-inch.  If they hold up as long a I hope they will, we'll be long-term Sceptre fans.  I really appreciate those of you who took time to write detailed reviews.  It was a definite help in deciding how to proceed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Michael Cusick "The IT Guy"
Reviews.Content: This is my first LED TV; our other TVs we have are LCD. For a unknown brand the product seems to be high quality and well made. So far so good. If you have Comcast, use the Sony TV codes for your remote to setup TV power and volume; the information is not listed in the user's guide but easy to find online.

Reviews.Title: Great For the Price
Reviews.Author: EVEYJ
Reviews.Content: Shipping was fast, price was reasonable, and quality is AWESOME for a brand I've never really heard of. I was a little nervous but needed a tv without breaking the bank... Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: The Good
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my second bedroom and I love it! It was easy to set up and the picture quality is really clear. My PS3 as looks great in full HD!If i needed another TV, I would buy this one in a heartbeat!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Luis E. Geara
Reviews.Content: Just bought this tv to be used as a cctv monitor, it works perfect, cheap and very nicely built.In Black Friday it was even cheaper, bought a second one for a friend.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Value
Reviews.Author: Dwayne L. Metcalf
Reviews.Content: Looked at this tv based on price. Bought it due to reviews. Very happy with results. Replaced an old picture tube tv for older parent. He is very pleased with picture and sound. You can't go wrong with this value.

Reviews.Title: A very good tv for the price.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Flores
Reviews.Content: I see alot of reviews saying that this tv is a terrible product, yet when i start eading i find that they addressing an issue that happens to all LCD and CRD tv's. Which is the sound but no picture, and honestly this is a problem which alot of tv's have due(not to the manufacter's production)to way the tv is handled. Now on to the review. My family has had this tv for over a year now and we have had no mechanical problems with it(save the crappy sound). This tv which a total of 9 people use for various reasons each day does its job like its supposed to. I read a review that the tv was no good for gaming(not true). The tv works amazingly with gaming. Especially new ones. Farcry3 looks amazing on this tv as well as Hitman: Absolution. Id recommend this tv to avid gamers as a relatively cheap and medium-quality tv. Well done sceptre.

Reviews.Title: Pictures
Reviews.Author: melfelicia
Reviews.Content: not good as I expected. the screen little bit too dark the sound is not as loud. I would use this for my office

Reviews.Title: Just as advertised & that is a good thing.
Reviews.Author: Richard K. Hull
Reviews.Content: Just as advertised and as the reviews said, it was well protected in the packing, plug it in and connect it and it is working.  No muss, no fuss.  Has a very nice picture and decent sound.  Isn't that what they should do?  Well,  this one does it.  Easy to get a universal remote to work with this TV, as in a DISH remote.

Reviews.Title: Really great tv for a good price
Reviews.Author: Karen Schieferstein
Reviews.Content: I had never heard of this brand of tv, but saw that it had some pretty good ratings.  And who could beat the price for $200 instead of $500?  I was a little nervous cuz I grew up with RCA, Sanyo, Zenith, Toshiba etc. So I wasn't used to buying something this big from a company I never heard of.  When it got here & I opened the box I will tell you I have never in my whole life seen anything packaged so well.  And I don't mean just the tv.  The tv itself was packaged in something other then styrofaom that when you take it out of the box it gets all over your lviing-room...you know that kind I mean...this however was not!  It was wrapped with this thicker plastic like substitute & was so easy to take off the edges of the tv & didn't make a mess everywhere!  Inside the box was a little plastic case, almost like a pencil case with like a ziplock bag zipper to open it.  Inside was everything you needed all packaged separately in ziplock baggies.  I was so impressed when I found an actual screwdriver.  Not just one of those cheapies you get in a kit to put stuff together.  It was a small screwdriver much like my Dad always carried in his pocket his whole life.  I also received batteries for the remote.  They were wrapped separately from the remote & not in the remote(got something once the batteries were in the remote & had exploded, yeah fun).  Assembly of the tv was super easy!  And hooking it up I got it in the first try!  Usually I have to move wires around 7020392031 times before I get it right.  The whole time I was doing this my husband was gone to pick up our daughter from school & by the time they came home 15 mins later the tv was up & running & she was really excited!  Great picture, great sound!!  SO worth it!!  What a clear pic!  And we can watch movies on the DVD player & they are clear & colorful!  And the Wii colors look great too!!!  Definitely would reccomend it!!!

Reviews.Title: Affordable and Reasonable
Reviews.Author: Jedi
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my new television. The only negative thing I can say its the volume but otherwise its a great purchase.Clear picture, not heavy and thin. I am going to mount it on the wall. The price was right!

Reviews.Title: Definitely pleased
Reviews.Author: Everett P. Mcleod "EMC"
Reviews.Content: It's all I wanted. 32 inch is perfect for a bedroom, and it has enough inputs to support 3 gaming consoles and it looks great. You don't really need more than 720p for 32 inch, most people agree that 1080p doesn't add much more quality on 32 inch. Having said that, the image looks fantastic, can't find a dead pixel.of the few cons, the bezel rotates, but it can't be turned up or down. the sound quality isn't that great, but you can always plug in an aux cord to the headphone jack and play through speakers instead. I got some altec lansing $20 speakers and the quality is way better than the tv, worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Serch
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because the price is lower than other LED TV's and this product have a good rate, i don't know nothing about Sceptre but after a research I realized that this is a good brand.About the TV, it is a great product has a clear image, a very good definition and a good brightness all of these features can be modified by the user so is possible configure it just like you want.The sound, it is good but not great, I mean you can play a game or see a movie with a pretty good sound but is not a good idea listen loud music on it.Slim, lightweight, easy to install a really good product.

Reviews.Title: Super value
Reviews.Author: Robert E Jacobson
Reviews.Content: For the price, you can't beat this for an ancillary TV.  It's in our kitchen and works great.  As others have commented, the factory settings for the picture are not good, but once you adjust these to your liking, it looks great.  For a bargain price, this TV is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: fast and carefully packed
Reviews.Author: samwisethefool
Reviews.Content: im in afghanistan and it was not even 10 days before it made it to me, and it was in one piece, VERY HAPPY!

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: kc
Reviews.Content: WHAT A GREAT TV FOR THE PRICE!!! GOT IT FOR MY DAUGHTER AND IT WORKS WELL FOR WHAT SHE NEEDS!!!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture for an AMAZING price
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: I never heard of Sceptre before, but bought this TV because of the great price. (A little over $170). It was BEYOND worth it. The delivery was extremely fast, and the picture is incredible. I LOVE my new TV!!

Reviews.Title: good choice
Reviews.Author: jim hangs
Reviews.Content: great tv good price it fit the bedroom it super clear easy to program easy to set up manual very clear

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong
Reviews.Author: KURT WIDMER
Reviews.Content: For the money, this T.V. is worth every penny. My son had to buy this because he broke the screen on my 32 inch Panasonic, while playing the Wii. So.....we agreed on getting this set and we were somewhat surprized on the quality of the T.V. My son basically uses it to play video games. Pictures look great! I did notice the the remote control was cheaply made and didn't have many options. Other than that, no problems.

Reviews.Title: Awesome but don't pay too much for it
Reviews.Author: matthieu_m
Reviews.Content: I bought the TV on black Friday for $179 instead of the usual $250+. Ordered it on Thursday night or Friday (not sure) and received it the following Tuesday morning. The good reviews on amazon about this unknown brand helped me make up my mind.Pros:- Very thin and light- Looks great, I like the tiny black frame around the screen.- Good if not great image, very bright.- The remote. It has all the usual handy buttons, but what I like about it is that you can add channels to you favorite list (and remove them) just by pressing one button and the channel is added instantly. Then you can easily browse your favorite channel by using 2 other keys on the remote.- The menu is clear and easy to navigate.- Tv is easy to set up, it will take you no more than 10 minutes to unpack it and install the base.- Several HDMI output, Usb output- Came with remote batteries and screwdriver for the baseCons:- The sound is ok but don't expect too much here. The Tv is very thin so you won't get large speakers with that. You can totally use it in a leaving room though. Just don't expect to have a party and be able to watch tv at the same time. Quality of sound is average too.- ???So definitely go for this tv you won't regret it if you can get it for under 250-300$. If its more expensive then I would still consider it but definitely compare it with other brands first.Finally: Awesome TV

Reviews.Title: Great bargin
Reviews.Author: BenjiBooks
Reviews.Content: Just recently got this TV. I set it up in no time and works great and looks awesome. Well compared to the 10 year old tv That it replaced.Will update if any failure occurs in the future.

Reviews.Title: Enough bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV and it was shipped and at my door within 3 days.  The contents inside were well packaged.  They even include a tiny screw driver for assembling the base.  The setup was super easy.  The stand is a little wobbly but it is sufficient enough.  The picture was very clear.  This makes a good TV for the bedroom.  I wouldn't use it as a primary tv for the living room because the sound is not sufficient for a large area. Overall I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: For $179, this TV is absolutely perfect! But...
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Gandara
Reviews.Content: I must have been one of the last or so to buy this Sceptre 32" from Amazon directly as it now doesn't show Amazon as a seller. To repeat what everyone else has said: Was hesitant to buy some unknown brand TV, but these reviews led me to buying it. Personally, this TV is HUGE! My room is very small so this TV looks like a 40 or 50 inch to me! Out of the box, very easy to put the base in however one of the screws did not fully tighten and the stand is pretty wobbly, but I love that you can actually move the TV from left to right (most TVs do not swivel) which is great for my needs. For those gamers out there: hooked up my PS3 and I didn't experience any sort of lag at all! Great picture though Sceptre does provide a lot of settings you can tweak.My main issue is the sound (and why it's a 4-star instead of a 5): My HP Pavillon dv7 laptop has better speakers than the Sceptre (though it could be because it has Beats Audio), and listening to the TV from my headset, it sounds very hollow and tinny but just change the audio setting to Dynamic and it's a lot better, but still just decent. But hey for what I payed for this TV ($179 + tax), I can live with the okay audio because the picture quality is great for the price, $300 or more and I would start to have issues. Sceptre also provides a cleaning cloth and a screwdriver for the base, and like another reviewer mentioned it's all packed very neatly.I will post pictures soon. If you can get this TV for around $200, it's a great investment.

Reviews.Title: Big bang for the buck!
Reviews.Author: Purvertedmunk
Reviews.Content: Just like most people, I was very skeptical about this TV because #1, I was not familiar with the Sceptre brand. #2, the price is dirt cheap, making me wonder if this deal was too good to be true. I went for it anyways because of the other positive reviews on Amazon. And just like most people, I got the TV delivered to my door step utilizing the free shipping option. It did not take very long to arrive, I ordered the TV on Thanksgiving night(Thursday) and got it by Tuesday afternoon. I immediately unboxed it and installed the stand. It was very easy to install the stand, all it took was 5 screws to the bottom of the unit (screw driver and screws included in package). I hooked up a blu ray player and watched a few scenes of Avatar to check out the picture quality, and let me tell you, I was not disappointed. I messed around with the picture settings and was able to improve quality just by "eye balling" the TV and settings(I will be investing in a HDTV calibration DVD shortly).All in all, I am very pleased with my purchase. Not an ounce of regret was felt by me and my wife when we saw the TV in action. For those of you looking for a secondary TV to place in a small room, this is it. I don't think you can find another TV this cheap that will get you the same quality as this one. It delivers as advertised.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Thomason Kennedy
Reviews.Content: For $200 including shipping, its a great deal.  But if you think you are going to be getting a state of the art tv experience with this thing you are sadly mistaken.  This TV was purchased for my 1 year old's room and it will be her TV.  So when she gets it dirty and breaks it, at $200 I wont be mad

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: May Chow
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is amazing.  I do not have this TV hooked up to cable or satelite.  I don't get many stations with just an antenna for over the air reception, but I get enough of the main channels.  I've had it for a little over a month now, and am surprised everyday how clear and crisp the picture is.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: nrs
Reviews.Content: Very good tv for the price. most inexpensive I could find at the time . Great picture and remote has all theOptions I want.Perfect in the bedroom for late night viewing.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 32 tv great
Reviews.Author: dhn
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with the quality of this TV and the ease of setup.  Total time from unwrap to operational was 15 mins.  The only thing I had to do was to attach the base.  They even included a screw driver to use.  All  materials in zip lock bags.  High quality user manual.  Very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Wow. I like it!
Reviews.Author: FisterD
Reviews.Content: I read all of the great reviews on this tv, so I decided to buy one for my travel trailer. With the HD antenna from my RV, the picture is amazing. $200 for a 32" tv with this picture quality is well worth the money IMHO.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, low price.
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture for the price.  It is not name brand quality, but for the price it is an excellent value. The only reason I did not give this TV 5 stars is because when the screen is dark, and the room is dark, you can see major inconsistent blacks.  In one corner and along some of the edges (even a little in the upper middle of the screen) when viewing dark scenes it is lighter than the rest of the TV. I am guessing this is a back-lighting issue. I am not sure if this is a defect in just my TV or if this is a defect in all of these TVs. I plan on calling customer support when they are open and asking that question.  If it is just my TV I will exchange it and increase to 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure exactly how to rate this - 3 stars as an ok TV, or 5 stars as a good TV for $200.The picture is good but not great, probably because its 7whateverP instead of 1080P.  Some of the other reviews say the picture is great, I disagree with that.  The TV in my living room has a great picture, this set doesn't compare.  I can see the pixels if I'm close.  Sound is OK.  Switching channels happens fairly quick without too much of a delay - better than the other cheap LED I have in a different bedroom.  The TV is thin and looks pretty good when its off.I also hooked it up to my laptop with the included HDMI cable - it works well as a monitor.So, if you're looking a cheap, reasonably decent TV for a bedroom, this thing is great.  If it's for your living room, you're better off saving your money a couple more months and buying something better.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture if you had a DVR
Reviews.Author: Jewell A. Ragsdale "Jewell & her Dogs"
Reviews.Content: I have only Cable and the Pic is great on most channels.  With a Connector of some sort it would be perfect!

Reviews.Title: Bang for your buck.
Reviews.Author: Erick B
Reviews.Content: Quick delivery. Very thin. Good quality. For $200, this is a steal. After I opened up my shipment, I was so satisfied I bought two more to give as gifts. There is not one thing I don't like about the TV. I recommend buying a FlatWave antenna to get all your basic channels on HD. Buy this TV, I am giving it a spectacular review because I thought I was going to be fooled for cheap quality and lack of brand but the TV looks way better than my $500 VIZIO. Buy it!!! or you will regret not buying it!

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 32" led tv
Reviews.Author: mikeakanice
Reviews.Content: Just got it. So far I am very pleased. I have it hooked up as a computer monitor until black friday when I get the 360 or ps3. The image is very sharp. I am not familiar with how well the upper brands look but to me this tv is fantastic. I have it in my bedroom. People have mentioned the sound as a problem. I turned it all the way up and I almost went deaf lol. Of course I am in a pretty small dorm room.  I will keep this at a 5 star rating unless something goes wrong. For now though, This tv deserves a 5.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price!
Reviews.Author: C. Milton
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my son's birthday to put in his bedroom. Since setting it up a month ago, I've had multiple friends purchase one based on the price and quality. One friend has bought 2! The wife and I are about to order another to replace an aging CRT TV in our bedroom.I honestly think at this price point it is the best TV you can buy. It has plenty of extras that you wouldn't normally find on similarly priced TV's.I had to do it all over again I would order the same TV no questions asked.Buy this TV if you want a quality TV for a phenomenal price!

Reviews.Title: My new bedroom T.V.
Reviews.Author: Kyle Culley
Reviews.Content: Great color, only the sound could be better so I got a pair of portable speakers. Well worth the price, great for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great price on a great TV
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: I picked this TV up for a bedroom TV (along with a tilting wall mount also purchased from here) that doesn't break the bank or remind me that I'm in an IMAX theatre at night.  The size and picture quality are very impressive.  The resolution of 720p is perfect for a bedroom or smaller room and it looks fantastic.  The size is easy enough to mount with a single person (provided you hit the rails with the hooks).The TV's menu and interface is simple enough, nothing too complicated.  You can't adjust colors the way I'm used to on my main 46" LED TV, but it doesn't require much tweaking to begin with.I do have two issues to address that a cable management junkie like might like to know:1.  The power connection is nothing different than one for a computer or a laser printer.  A big 3 prong plug and straight connection to the bottom of the TV.  This makes a flush wall mount difficult, as it would have been nice to have a 90' connection on both ends.2.  The way the plastic blocks the bottom connections, where the antenna in and power in connections are located, are blocked by the plastic molding of the TV.  Not a deal breaker, but definitely something to keep in mind.  I'm going to look at purchasing both a 90' power cable and coaxial cable to help manage the connections on my side.Overall, I'd recommend this to someone who is wanting to get a bedroom TV or guest room, or for a child to use as their main TV.

Reviews.Title: Got the Job done
Reviews.Author: Captain
Reviews.Content: This TV is being used as a tailgater monitor. The picture looks good, even though I am using a Digital TV Antenna. Great unit for the price.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Bek
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time.  The set up was simple. Two 10 Watt speakers, nice sound, great picture.  Best price. I recommend it to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre E325BV-HDH 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: DB
Reviews.Content: First & foremost, it's a $200.00 TV & as such NOT worthy of 5 stars. Sure it's a good value, maybe even better than a "good" value, but that alone doesn't make it 5-star material IMO.I find fault with the sound system: Speakers that are aimed down will NEVER sound as good as speakers aimed AT the audience. The adjustable 7-band equalizer sure helps, but adjusting it is "clunky" & won't fully overcome the poor speaker placement.I find fault with the brightness/contrast: If it's adjusted so that dark areas can be seen, bright/white areas are washed out. If it's adjusted so that bright/whites are not washed out, dark scenes/areas are fully black.I find fault with the fact that I must see "SCEPTRE" for 3-4 seconds before the TV "turns on" every time it's switched on. Like I can't see the manufacturer's name at the bottom/front of the TV?I find fault with the IR receiver on the TV: The remotes MUST be aimed AT the TV to work while my satellite box & old Sylvania crt will receive the IR signal bounced off the wall. This makes volume/mute changes from bed much more awkward.Finally, I can't, FOR THE LIFE OF ME, understand why there needs to be a bright red light lit on the front of the TV when it's turned OFF! WHY?!? I can ALMOST understand why there needs to be a light showing when the TV is turned on, but when it's OFF?!?!?!? WHY?!? No matter how small, it's still a needless power vampire in that respect, one that's now covered by black electrical tape.It's a good, even VERY good, $200 TV, but IMHO has too many faults to warrant more than 3 stars. Surprisingly enough, I probably WOULD recommend this TV to a friend, but with the caveat that it does have it's faults & weaknesses.

Reviews.Title: Buy it!
Reviews.Author: C. White
Reviews.Content: I'll make this short and sweet. You will not find a better quality made TV, with the features of this one, at the price offered here(keep in mind the shipping is free). They must be selling like hot cakes. It has a exceptional HD picture even though it has only a 60mHz refresh rate. Very good TV tuner, many channels come in in 720p or 1080p, and the picture quality is unbelievably good if your signal source is in HD. The case is nice with thin bezel, the LED is a miser when it come to energy, and a clear crisp picture that you can adjust to your own liking. The sound is quite exceptable and also can be adjusted to your own liking. The remote is perfect. I'm going to love having this TV. I bought it for my bedroom and didn't need a top of the line TV, but this is more than I expected. It comes with a high quality instruction booklet that's clear and concise. That should be your first clue that it's not some junkie no name brand. Liked it so much I wanted to buy another, but I already have a 47" 120 mHz, 3D, WiFi in the living room and my place is only one a bedroom. Would make a perfect gift for someone special in your life. I recommend this TV if your in the market for a good quality, budget minded TV. It was delivered in record time, thanks again to Amazon's fine service.

Reviews.Title: 32" LED TV $209  !!!!!!  NICE !!!!!
Reviews.Author: jerry
Reviews.Content: At first I JUST THOUGHT about getting this TV. I never heard the name brand, so I was skeptical at first. I figured at only $209, why  not? I'm in Afhhanistan working and the 32" LCD TV that the PX(military store)have here is $349. Thats a big difference of $140. I got the 3 year warranty too, so if it does go bad, I'll just mail it back home. I am planning on buying another one or two for our new house. Its a good TV, REALLY GOOD at $209!! Can't beat the price for a 32" LED TV at $209. I was really surprised by the weight too. Its really light and thin!! It would be great for a trailer or RV!! It really is a nice TV and the picture is good too. It has plenty of connections, and inputs too. I'm using a HDMI connection from my laptop. I'm very pleased with my purchase. The total was $209 and it was delivered free, no shipping!! Can't beat that!!

Reviews.Title: Sound is pretty bad
Reviews.Author: Miriam L. Iverson "Inveterate Seeker"
Reviews.Content: The picture is distorted so that most people hardly look like themselves.  The sound is muffled on high volume and hard to hear on low volume.  I wouldn't buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: John V. Bouchard
Reviews.Content: Bought to replace a 13 inch TV in my daughter's dorm room at college.  Has a very nice picture but the sound is a little bit lacking.  I will try some additional speakers as recommended by other reviewers.Overall, very pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV.. But....
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: The TV is nice and for the price I paid, really can't be beat. Screen is nice, sound is weak and tinny though.Make sure you check that the mount you purchase is Wall mountable 400 x 200 VESA Standard.I bought the wrong one, and that was the standard 200 X 200 and it will not fit. My fault for not checking better.My daughter now has to wait until i can get the correct one delivered and installed.

Reviews.Title: Remote
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The TV picture is great. The remote control device does not have a code. Accordingly, I cannot control the sound volume with my cable-company supplied remote. I must use two remote control devices instead of a single device.

Reviews.Title: It's inexpensive
Reviews.Author: Charles L. Cerino
Reviews.Content: It doesnt use the small foot print for the VESA mount system so don't buy the recomended swivel mount with it.  You need the extended one...Also this has the worst remote I have ever seen.  There is no way to change inputs

Reviews.Title: Does the job.
Reviews.Author: Ryan Grenz
Reviews.Content: Haven't had the TV that long, but it appears to do what it is supposed to.Bought it as a second TV to have hooked up to the computer for viewing in the bedroom. Overall, the picture isn't bad but isn't true HD (as you would know from reading the specs). The picture is crisp depending on what you are watching, so have realistic expectations.My only complaint is the speaker quality. I didn't have high expectations since a flat screen is tough to put decent speakers into, but they could have done a bit better job here.  There is very little low end (bass) in the unit, which gives everything a "tin can" sound.
