With some adjustments, you can make it better.This is servicable as a TV but don't use it as your main unit.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Debim
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for the money! Easy to set up, color is beautiful. If you use both cords in box you will get a lot of feedback in the sound. That's because you only need to use 1 of them. Lol  Sceptre E325BV-HDH 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: marriagecoach1
Reviews.Content: This TV is a great TV even if it is an off brand.  We had our TV killed by lightening and it was going to cost moreto have it fixed than buying this same sized new TV.  For us it was a "no brainer".  Thanks Amazon for stocking thisTV at such a great price.John Wilder is a marriage, relationship and sexual coach with a new book coming out in January on Amazon

Reviews.Title: Love it just one issue
Reviews.Author: Chaos
Reviews.Content: I love this tv picture is great sound is ok I hooked a surround sound system to it but there is no pip feature I could really use this bit it's all good I will live

Reviews.Title: Good over all.....
Reviews.Author: Ron Iacobucci "Ron L"
Reviews.Content: Picture on this TV is awesome.  I never had an LCD or LED TV so I was very impressed.  Sound is also very good.  The problem with this TV was that it casts "ghosts" around the edges.  Some areas are very noticeable, some not so much.  But it was enough that I sent the TV back.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Gomer 42k
Reviews.Content: I bought this mostly for my son to run video games from the xbox, but the picture is quite good from netflix or HD cable.  wouldnt pay over 200 for this resolution, but otherwise a good deal.  LED is pretty good color and picture, but this is no samsung.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: rebecca a sand
Reviews.Content: We got this for our bedroom and it works out great the only problem is I can tell the difference in speakers coated to my other t.v's. other than that the picture quality is good for wht I paid kudos...

Reviews.Title: Using it as a...
Reviews.Author: SmartShopper
Reviews.Content: I'm using this TV as a monitor for my other gaming computer.I don't know how good this is for watching tv, but i've been using it as a monitor with no problems.The quality (Once again, as a monitor), is good (But big due to it being 720p, if you try using it as you would a 1080p tv, it won't be that great)Great for the price!

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: lbranum
Reviews.Content: just a wonderful tv very clear picture very light waight just a fantastic tv for a unknown brandhave known brands and this tv is just as good if not better

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Goose
Reviews.Content: This TV is really nice.  The sound is not the greatest but most tvs sound isn't that great. The picture is out of this world if you use HD.  There are a lot of ports which is why i really bought it.  3 HDMI Ports is awesome.  There is a HD Component ports (red blue yellow) and there are a lot more.  I would really recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Mark Tam
Reviews.Content: The TV performs well.  For the price, you can't go wrong.  It is 720p, but we don't get HD 1080p here so this works fine.

Reviews.Title: Nice cheap LCD HD (720P)
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Item arrived in two business days, slight difference b/w two days and two business days.  Plus wait two days just for it to be shipped.  However Display is crisp, easy setup, and just works with our HD Cable, and progressive scanned regular DVD's.  Nice price and our first HD TV.  Yes it isn't 1080P, but I can't tell.

Reviews.Title: Godd TV
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: good TV, the dispay is worth for this price!it has good instruction for install it on the wall. the remote is also good!

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Chelan "Chelan"
Reviews.Content: I was leery to purchase an off brand product but was pleasantly surprised.Very light weight, excellent picture quality and sound.

Reviews.Title: Worse Experience
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV because of so many good reviews and because the price was just right.When the product arrived i took it out of the box and set it up in my bedroom, the TV itself is thin and so is the border around the TV so that's a 1+ for me. The border around the tv did not have a glossy finish. The picture it produces is nice and bright.  After using the television for about 3 days i noticed some discoloration on the tv. You could only notice it when the screen was black, you can't really notice it when the tv has other colors on screen so i thought that was kind of odd. I was not expecting this from a "new" TV so i returned it for a replacement.Today received my replacement. The box itself looked kind of odd, it looked repackaged in a way. I opened it up to find out it was not the same as the one i had before but the actual tv with the glossy finish! so i thought that was pretty cool. Once i took out the TV i found out the bag with the screw driver and booklets was torn from the bottom.I then grew suspicious as to why the box looked so odd. I didn't even peel off the plastics from the television or connected my cable. i just turned the television on to make sure it wasn't like the last one and to my surprise the TV had worse discoloration than the last TV.i am extremely unsatisfied by this and i am returning it tomorrow. to have both TV with the same defect is extremely unpleasant. The television its self would of been great if it wasn't for the discoloration issue i had. i gave the TV 3 stars out of 5 because if you aren't bothered by the discoloration issue i had, then this is the perfect LED television for you.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, bad sound
Reviews.Author: techtechmomma
Reviews.Content: I just got this tv and I am thankful its for the bedroom. If you already have a sound system in place, and you NEED a cheaper LED then you're set. Get this TV. If you are using it by itself for movies, without and external sound system. You may want to reconsider. The sound is the same that you get out of the hand held remotes when you're in the hospital.  Also, if you do not have and HD cable box, and don't intend to get one, don't buy an HD tv. IT IS HORRID! We hooked this up in the bedroom and our old tube tv kicked this TV out of the park. We took it into the living room and hooked it up with and hdmi from the hd signal box and it was so much better. It was still pretty bad on the regular channels though. All in all its an ok tv for the price. But the walmart plasma tv's with good sound may be a better match for a bargain seeker. IMO

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Jay P. Lieberman "jaylieb"
Reviews.Content: Couldn't be happier.  We purchased for the bedroom, so it is not our primary tv. It's not better than our bigger, more expensive tv in the living room, but for $200 this is great.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Charles Dagaev
Reviews.Content: This is a really good tv at a great price. I bought two of these for my kids, and the picture looks better than my full HD tv from sharp.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, and not just for the money
Reviews.Author: M.A
Reviews.Content: Beautiful bright picture, easy installation, and the sound is just fine, can't find anything wrong with it. For $209 shipped, it's a no-brainer.

Reviews.Title: Had to return because of discoloration
Reviews.Author: Franklin H. Fischer
Reviews.Content: My dad bought me this TV on Black Friday as an early Christmas present (thanks, Pops!) because it was cheap and had some good reviews on Amazon. I guess sometimes you really do get what you pay for.The TV was easy enough to unpack and assemble. Unfortunately, after I plugged it in I noticed a yellow discoloration in the bottom corners of the screen. This yellow haze was very noticeable during dark scenes, which pretty much ruins most TV shows and movies for me.I wanted to exchange the TV for a new one of the same model, but Amazon informed me that they couldn't because they were out of stock at the time. Instead I just returned it and the Ol' Man got his money back.Although the TV was messed up, Amazon's customer service was excellent as always and the TV was easy to return. I'm gonna look for a bigger TV now, so everything kinda worked out in the end.

Reviews.Title: Upset but happy
Reviews.Author: beto2k2000
Reviews.Content: First review i have ever done and unfortunatly it is bad. The TV looked good in the pictures but when i received it, the thing would not turn on. Dont know if it was a wire problem or i just got a bad tv. Highly upset, i returned it. Very dissapointed in amazon for sending me a diffective tv. Maybe it was just mine. meh.Giving Amazon 5 stars for the quick refund and return pick of the TV. I was upset that i got a doa tv but happy that amazon took care of everything and refunded my money within a couple of days of the return. amazing job amazon.thanks.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for, horrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Corey B. Mcguire
Reviews.Content: I got this TV on black Friday for a really good deal.  When I installed the TV the stand was defective and therefore the TV stood crooked. I contacted SCEPTRE customer service and left a message.  They never got back to me. The following day I called their sales department and of course someone immediately picked up.  Since their address was 25 miles for my house I drove to get a replacement stand. The replacement stand worked for the most part except its still a couple millimeters off. The individual I dealt with at SCEPTRE was nice but their overall customer services practices are shady at best. The overall quality of the TV is average but I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: happy mee
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: got this tv as it said on the delivery date its overall a nice thin hd tv. i was overall happy with the product jus one thing is that i get these weird glares side to side but overall im extremely happy with this tv was cheap nd everything was easy to set up. it wud been cool to get a mount for it but other then that im happy and satisfied!

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: red
Reviews.Content: very good picture> bang for ur buck. i wonder if the latger sizes have the same picture quality. good buy, good quality

Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD...
Reviews.Author: Jeremy B. Bowers "Live Life Like you STOLE it!"
Reviews.Content: I got mine in the mail today. Here's a quick review.PRO's#1 Very sharp, I've only tested on public broadcasting channels but they seem okay.#2 Stronger reception, I am getting more channels then my old vacuum tube TV and the channels don't cut out like the older TV as well.#3 Easy setup out of the box, just screw the stand to the bottom with the provided screw driver.CON's#1 Its very light because its made completely out of plastic, maybe not that rugged.#2 nothing more, will update if anything comes up

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Mr. Nat"
Reviews.Content: TV excellent well pack value of the price was good.... perfect entry level TV.... cannot go wrong for the price.

Reviews.Title: I have no idea.
Reviews.Author: S. Majocha "Nursee13"
Reviews.Content: I gave this a two because I never actually received the item.  I wasn't home the first time but I checked off that they could leave it there without me being home and I signed it.  They refused to and said why would we ever leave a TV in front of someone's house?  As crazy as it seems, UPS has let me do that before so I was pretty mad.  I live in a safe neighborhood and was going to take the responsibility if something happened.  So if you work every day like normal people, make sure you order this when UPS might come on a Saturday so you will be home.

Reviews.Title: It.s okay
Reviews.Author: Earl Stillwagon
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a nice clear picture, don't buy this TV!!!  The color is way off, blues are green and so forth. Tried to adjust the colors on tv but nothing worked to fix the problem.

Reviews.Title: Glowing lower edge
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This television is alright, but I am very much not impressed with the glowing lower edges. As I am unable to exchange this defective device due to the fact that Amazon was merely acting as a storefront for another supplier and that supplier is currently out of this model, I will be returning it and selecting something with a lower failure rate.Not worth the hassle if you get a bad one.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied customer/NEVER again shopper
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: This was my first and last order from amazon, I go to cancel my order or price match and they tell me their 14 day policy doesn't apply because its not from amazon, now how would I know that I purchased it from you (amazon) I was charged for a product I didn't receive and over a month later NO credit. Never again from these people !

Reviews.Title: weak tuner
Reviews.Author: Albert Carter
Reviews.Content: The picture is sharp while you have it.  The tuner did not handle weak signals well at all.  Screen cracks up from time to time.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Craig J. Boudreaux
Reviews.Content: The picture is not real clear. In high def its a good picture. But without high def the quality is poor.

Reviews.Title: USB doesn't support video
Reviews.Author: Nichole
Reviews.Content: I was about to buy this TV from Amazon, because the price was really good. But why? So I went to Sceptre's website--turns out their USB port supports audio and JPG only. Maybe not a big deal for some, but I want my USB port to support video, so this was a deal breaker for me!

Reviews.Title: Present
Reviews.Author: Marcello Dellaccio
Reviews.Content: I don't know yet It was a present for Christmas to my girlfriend I will let you know as soon she gets it.

Reviews.Title: USB port only for MP3 and pictures
Reviews.Author: Vero
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to watch movies form a USB stick. Unfortunately it only reads music and pictures from a (up to 2GB) thumb drive. I'm returning it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sleek & Slim 32 LED Class (31.5-Inch Viewable) 720P HDTV
3 x HDMI Port, USB Port
ATSC/NTSC/Clear QAM
60 Hz Refresh Rate
Wall mountable 400 x 200 VESA Standard
ProductInfo.Name: Sceptre E325BV-HDH 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
